name: Viper
details:
Mini Passive Volume/Expression PedalThe Donner Viper Mini Volume/Expression 2 in 1 Pedal is a multi-functional pedal with extremely lightweight casing, which provides convenience for guitarists. The Viper delivers both an excellent Expression response along with Volume function and all in a small footprint. Special analog circuit design, and automatically detects and catchs output source (EXP/Vol) objective. Very small footprint and much shorter than a standard Expression pedal or Volume pedal. Made of hard plastic lightweight casing but very robust and well made. Smooth taper responds to various parameters with precision. Works without battery or pedal power supply, extensive range with guitar, bass and other musical instruments. 
Analog circuit design, 2 functions in 1 pedal- passive volume and expression pedal.
Automatically detects and catchs output source (EXP/Vol) objective.
Made of hard plastic lightweight casing but very robust and well made.
Smooth taper responds to various parameters with precision.
Works without battery or pedal power supply, extensive range with guitar, bass and other musical instruments.

Specifications
Input: 1/4"Monaural Jack.
Output: 1/4"Monaural Jack.
Working Current: 10mA.
Dimensions: 148.5mm (D)*65.5mm (W)*60mm (H)
Net Weight: 280g (with box)

https://www.donnerdeal.com/collections/guitar-effect-pedal/products/donner-viper-mini-volume-expression-pedal
